div.class: dl-col-lg-9 dl-col-md-9 dl-col-sm-9 dl-col-xs-9 bhoechie-tab customer-log-table-size customer_log-orderwidth

table.class: table stripe hover row-border order-column dataTable no-footer

div.t-attf-class: #{(table.state) == 'inprogress' ? 'res_table room_service popper hm-booked-service' : 'res_table room_service popper inprogress_room' }

div.p: Do you want to create a order?
